FuncDef: This command binds an Epipe to a NAT context running on an ISA-BB, allowing the Epipe to act as the outside service for the NAT or firewall. Whennat-outsideis enabled, one end of the Epipe is implicitly tied to ISA BB forwarding, leaving one remaining SAP, spoke, or similar available to be configured.

ParaDef.Info: The NAT group ID where the PPPoE client is applied.
